item.description:
Here is the Snow Park's website:

http://www.skinashoba.com/tubing.html

We should get a group going and go snow tubing. I'll put a tentative date (Jan 13th) and see if we can get 6+ people to go. Dress warmly!!!

 

UPDATE: They finally listed the costs: It's $28 for a two-hour long ticket (Yeah, like they really check). While that looks steep, these are loooong slides. Longer and much faster than ski ward over in Shrewsbury. Please let me know if you'd like to change the time to a bit earlier, since there'll be more tube traffic on the slopes at this time.

 

After the event, we'll see if we can go see the beginning of the Pat's game at a restaurant of our choosing.
item.name: Snow tubing at Nashoba Valley Snow Tubing Park
